content: And yet, Medium seems intent on rewarding those who create content that can be found, let’s face it, anywhere else on the internet. There are plenty of sites where you can find listicles and pseudo-inspirational crap for those days when you feel like you need a kick in the ass. I don’t know about you, but that’s not why I come here. The pieces that I’ve read and have haunted or inspired me have not been the ones that promise 37 Ways to Be More Productive Before 3:27 AM or 15 Ways to Make Your Asshole Smell Like Fine Wine — they have been heartfelt, heart wrenching, authentic pieces that were raw, unique, and relatable.
